text.div:
This code system https://openimis.github.io/openimis_fhir_r4_ig/CodeSystem/insurance-plan-coverage-benefit-limit defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
period PeriodDuration of the period in months, in which a policy with the product will be valid.
memberCount Member CountMaximal number of members of a household/group for the product.

name: InsurancePlanCoverageBenefitLimitCS
title: Coverage Benefit Limit Types (InsurancePlan)
description: Indicates the Coverage Benefit Limit Types for an InsurancePlan. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

concept.definition: Duration of the period in months, in which a policy with the product will be valid.
Maximal number of members of a household/group for the product.
